ITEM_MASTER_BALL.name: Master Ball
ITEM_MASTER_BALL.description: The best Ball with the ultimate level of performance. It will catch any wild Pokémon without fail.

ITEM_ULTRA_BALL.name: Ultra Ball
ITEM_ULTRA_BALL.description: An ultra-performance Ball that provides a higher Pokémon catch rate than a Great Ball.

ITEM_GREAT_BALL.name: Great Ball
ITEM_GREAT_BALL.description: A good, high-performance Ball that provides a higher Pokémon catch rate than a standard Poké Ball.

ITEM_POKE_BALL.name: Poké Ball
ITEM_POKE_BALL.description: A device for catching wild Pokémon. It is thrown like a ball at the target. It is designed as a capsule system.

ITEM_SAFARI_BALL.name: Safari Ball
ITEM_SAFARI_BALL.description: A special Poké Ball that is used only in the Great Marsh. It is decorated in a camouflage pattern.

ITEM_NET_BALL.name: Net Ball
ITEM_NET_BALL.description: A somewhat different Poké Ball that works especially well on Water- and Bug-type Pokémon.

ITEM_DIVE_BALL.name: Dive Ball
ITEM_DIVE_BALL.description: A somewhat different Poké Ball that works especially well on Pokémon that live in the sea.

ITEM_NEST_BALL.name: Nest Ball
ITEM_NEST_BALL.description: A somewhat different Poké Ball that works especially well on weaker Pokémon in the wild.

ITEM_REPEAT_BALL.name: Repeat Ball
ITEM_REPEAT_BALL.description: A somewhat different Poké Ball that works especially well on Pokémon species that were previously caught.

ITEM_TIMER_BALL.name: Timer Ball
ITEM_TIMER_BALL.description: A somewhat different Ball that becomes progressively better the more turns there are in a battle.

ITEM_LUXURY_BALL.name: Luxury Ball
ITEM_LUXURY_BALL.description: A comfortable Poké Ball that makes a caught wild Pokémon quickly grow friendly.

ITEM_PREMIER_BALL.name: Premier Ball
ITEM_PREMIER_BALL.description: A somewhat rare Poké Ball that has been specially made to commemorate an event of some sort.

ITEM_DUSK_BALL.name: Dusk Ball
ITEM_DUSK_BALL.description: A somewhat different Poké Ball that makes it easier to catch wild Pokémon at night or in dark places like caves.

ITEM_HEAL_BALL.name: Heal Ball
ITEM_HEAL_BALL.description: A remedial Poké Ball that restores the caught Pokémon’s HP and eliminates any status problem.

ITEM_QUICK_BALL.name: Quick Ball
ITEM_QUICK_BALL.description: A somewhat different Poké Ball that provides a better catch rate if it is used at the start of a wild encounter.

ITEM_CHERISH_BALL.name: Cherish Ball
ITEM_CHERISH_BALL.description: A quite rare Poké Ball that has been specially crafted to commemorate an occasion of some sort.

ITEM_POTION.name: Potion
ITEM_POTION.description: A spray-type medicine for wounds. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by just 20 points.

ITEM_ANTIDOTE.name: Antidote
ITEM_ANTIDOTE.description: A spray-type medicine. It lifts the effect of poison from one Pokémon.

ITEM_BURN_HEAL.name: Burn Heal
ITEM_BURN_HEAL.description: A spray-type medicine. It heals a single Pokémon that is suffering from a burn.

ITEM_ICE_HEAL.name: Ice Heal
ITEM_ICE_HEAL.description: A spray-type medicine. It defrosts a Pokémon that has been frozen solid.

ITEM_AWAKENING.name: Awakening
ITEM_AWAKENING.description: A spray-type medicine. It awakens a Pokémon from the clutches of sleep.

ITEM_PARALYZE_HEAL.name: Paralyze Heal
ITEM_PARALYZE_HEAL.description: A spray-type medicine. It eliminates paralysis from a single Pokémon.

ITEM_FULL_RESTORE.name: Full Restore
ITEM_FULL_RESTORE.description: A medicine that fully restores the HP and heals any status problems of a single Pokémon.

ITEM_MAX_POTION.name: Max Potion
ITEM_MAX_POTION.description: A spray-type medicine for wounds. It completely restores the HP of a single Pokémon.

ITEM_HYPER_POTION.name: Hyper Potion
ITEM_HYPER_POTION.description: A spray-type medicine for wounds. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 200 points.

ITEM_SUPER_POTION.name: Super Potion
ITEM_SUPER_POTION.description: A spray-type medicine for wounds. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 50 points.

ITEM_FULL_HEAL.name: Full Heal
ITEM_FULL_HEAL.description: A spray-type medicine. It heals all the status problems of a single Pokémon.

ITEM_REVIVE.name: Revive
ITEM_REVIVE.description: A medicine that revives a fainted Pokémon. It restores half the Pokémon’s maximum HP.

ITEM_MAX_REVIVE.name: Max Revive
ITEM_MAX_REVIVE.description: A medicine that revives a fainted Pokémon. It fully restores the Pokémon’s HP.

ITEM_FRESH_WATER.name: Fresh Water
ITEM_FRESH_WATER.description: Water with a high mineral content. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 50 points.

ITEM_SODA_POP.name: Soda Pop
ITEM_SODA_POP.description: A fizzy soda drink. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 60 points.

ITEM_LEMONADE.name: Lemonade
ITEM_LEMONADE.description: A very sweet drink. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 80 points.

ITEM_MOOMOO_MILK.name: Moomoo Milk
ITEM_MOOMOO_MILK.description: Milk with a very high nutrition content. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 100 points.

ITEM_ENERGY_POWDER.name: Energy Powder
ITEM_ENERGY_POWDER.description: A very bitter medicine powder. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 50 points.

ITEM_ENERGY_ROOT.name: Energy Root
ITEM_ENERGY_ROOT.description: A very bitter root. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 200 points.

ITEM_HEAL_POWDER.name: Heal Powder
ITEM_HEAL_POWDER.description: A very bitter medicine powder. It heals all the status problems of a single Pokémon.

ITEM_REVIVAL_HERB.name: Revival Herb
ITEM_REVIVAL_HERB.description: A very bitter medicinal herb. It revives a fainted Pokémon, fully restoring its HP.

ITEM_ETHER.name: Ether
ITEM_ETHER.description: It restores the PP of a Pokémon’s selected move by a maximum of 10 points.

ITEM_MAX_ETHER.name: Max Ether
ITEM_MAX_ETHER.description: It fully restores the PP of a single selected move that has been learned by the target Pokémon.

ITEM_ELIXIR.name: Elixir
ITEM_ELIXIR.description: It restores the PP of all the moves learned by the targeted Pokémon by 10 points each.

ITEM_MAX_ELIXIR.name: Max Elixir
ITEM_MAX_ELIXIR.description: It fully restores the PP of all the moves learned by the targeted Pokémon.

ITEM_LAVA_COOKIE.name: Lava Cookie
ITEM_LAVA_COOKIE.description: Lavaridge Town’s local specialty. It heals all the status problems of one Pokémon.

ITEM_BERRY_JUICE.name: Berry Juice
ITEM_BERRY_JUICE.description: A 100% pure juice made of Berries. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by just 20 points.

ITEM_SACRED_ASH.name: Sacred Ash
ITEM_SACRED_ASH.description: It revives all fainted Pokémon. In doing so, it also fully restores their HP.

ITEM_HP_UP.name: HP Up
ITEM_HP_UP.description: A nutritious drink for Pokémon. It raises the base HP of a single Pokémon.

ITEM_PROTEIN.name: Protein
ITEM_PROTEIN.description: A nutritious drink for Pokémon. It raises the base Attack stat of a single Pokémon.

ITEM_IRON.name: Iron
ITEM_IRON.description: A nutritious drink for Pokémon. It raises the base Defense stat of a single Pokémon.

ITEM_CARBOS.name: Carbos
ITEM_CARBOS.description: A nutritious drink for Pokémon. It raises the base Speed stat of a single Pokémon.

ITEM_CALCIUM.name: Calcium
ITEM_CALCIUM.description: A nutritious drink for Pokémon. It raises the base Sp. Atk (Special Attack) stat of a single Pokémon.

ITEM_RARE_CANDY.name: Infinite Candy
ITEM_RARE_CANDY.description: A candy that is packed with energy. It raises the level of a single Pokémon by one.

ITEM_PP_UP.name: PP Up
ITEM_PP_UP.description: It slightly raises the maximum PP of a selected move that has been learned by the target Pokémon.

ITEM_ZINC.name: Zinc
ITEM_ZINC.description: A nutritious drink for Pokémon. It raises the base Sp. Def (Special Defense) stat of a single Pokémon.

ITEM_PP_MAX.name: PP Max
ITEM_PP_MAX.description: It maximally raises the top PP of a selected move that has been learned by the target Pokémon.

ITEM_OLD_GATEAU.name: Old Gateau
ITEM_OLD_GATEAU.description: Old Chateau’s hidden specialty. It heals all the status problems of a single Pokémon.

ITEM_GUARD_SPEC.name: Guard Spec.
ITEM_GUARD_SPEC.description: An item that prevents stat reduction among the Trainer’s party Pokémon for five turns after use.

ITEM_DIRE_HIT.name: Dire Hit
ITEM_DIRE_HIT.description: An item that raises the critical-hit ratio of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.

ITEM_X_ATTACK.name: X Attack
ITEM_X_ATTACK.description: An item that raises the Attack stat of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.

ITEM_X_DEFENSE.name: X Defend
ITEM_X_DEFENSE.description: An item that raises the Defense stat of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.

ITEM_X_SPEED.name: X Speed
ITEM_X_SPEED.description: An item that raises the Speed stat of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.

ITEM_X_ACCURACY.name: X Accuracy
ITEM_X_ACCURACY.description: An item that raises the accuracy of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.

ITEM_X_SPECIAL.name: X Special
ITEM_X_SPECIAL.description: An item that raises the Sp. Atk stat of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.

ITEM_X_SP_DEF.name: X Sp. Def
ITEM_X_SP_DEF.description: An item that raises the Sp. Def stat of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.

ITEM_POKE_DOLL.name: Poké Doll
ITEM_POKE_DOLL.description: A doll that attracts Pokémon. Use it to flee from any battle with a wild Pokémon.

ITEM_FLUFFY_TAIL.name: Fluffy Tail
ITEM_FLUFFY_TAIL.description: An item that attracts Pokémon. Use it to flee from any battle with a wild Pokémon.

ITEM_BLUE_FLUTE.name: Blue Flute
ITEM_BLUE_FLUTE.description: A blue flute made from blown glass. Its melody awakens a single Pokémon from sleep.

ITEM_YELLOW_FLUTE.name: Yellow Flute
ITEM_YELLOW_FLUTE.description: A yellow flute made from blown glass. Its melody snaps a single Pokémon out of confusion.

ITEM_RED_FLUTE.name: Red Flute
ITEM_RED_FLUTE.description: A red flute made from blown glass. Its melody snaps a single Pokémon out of infatuation.

ITEM_BLACK_FLUTE.name: Black Flute
ITEM_BLACK_FLUTE.description: A black flute made from blown glass. Its melody makes wild Pokémon less likely to appear.

ITEM_WHITE_FLUTE.name: White Flute
ITEM_WHITE_FLUTE.description: A white flute made from blown glass. Its melody makes wild Pokémon more likely to appear.

ITEM_SHOAL_SALT.name: Shoal Salt
ITEM_SHOAL_SALT.description: Pure salt that was discovered deep inside the Shoal Cave. It is extremely salty.

ITEM_SHOAL_SHELL.name: Shoal Shell
ITEM_SHOAL_SHELL.description: A pretty seashell that was found deep inside the Shoal Cave. It is striped in blue and white.

ITEM_RED_SHARD.name: Red Shard
ITEM_RED_SHARD.description: A small red shard. It appears to be from some sort of implement made long ago.

ITEM_BLUE_SHARD.name: Blue Shard
ITEM_BLUE_SHARD.description: A small blue shard. It appears to be from some sort of implement made long ago.

ITEM_YELLOW_SHARD.name: Yellow Shard
ITEM_YELLOW_SHARD.description: A small yellow shard. It appears to be from some sort of implement made long ago.

ITEM_GREEN_SHARD.name: Green Shard
ITEM_GREEN_SHARD.description: A small green shard. It appears to be from some sort of implement made long ago.

ITEM_SUPER_REPEL.name: Super Repel
ITEM_SUPER_REPEL.description: An item that prevents weak wild Pokémon from appearing for 200 steps after its use.

ITEM_MAX_REPEL.name: Max Repel
ITEM_MAX_REPEL.description: An item that prevents weak wild Pokémon from appearing for 250 steps after its use.

ITEM_ESCAPE_ROPE.name: Escape Rope
ITEM_ESCAPE_ROPE.description: A long, durable rope. Use it to escape instantly from a cave or a dungeon.

ITEM_REPEL.name: Repel
ITEM_REPEL.description: An item that prevents weak wild Pokémon from appearing for 100 steps after its use.

ITEM_SUN_STONE.name: Sun Stone
ITEM_SUN_STONE.description: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is as red as the sun.

ITEM_MOON_STONE.name: Moon Stone
ITEM_MOON_STONE.description: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is as black as the night sky.

ITEM_FIRE_STONE.name: Fire Stone
ITEM_FIRE_STONE.description: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is colored orange.

ITEM_THUNDER_STONE.name: Thunder Stone
ITEM_THUNDER_STONE.description: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It has a thunderbolt pattern.

ITEM_WATER_STONE.name: Water Stone
ITEM_WATER_STONE.description: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is a clear, light blue.

ITEM_LEAF_STONE.name: Leaf Stone
ITEM_LEAF_STONE.description: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It has a leaf pattern.

ITEM_TINY_MUSHROOM.name: Tiny Mushroom
ITEM_TINY_MUSHROOM.description: A small and rare mushroom. It is quite popular among certain maniacal fan segments.

ITEM_BIG_MUSHROOM.name: Big Mushroom
ITEM_BIG_MUSHROOM.description: A large and rare mushroom. It is very popular among certain maniacal fan segments.

ITEM_PEARL.name: Pearl
ITEM_PEARL.description: A somewhat-small pearl that sparkles in a pretty silver color. It can be sold cheaply to shops.

ITEM_BIG_PEARL.name: Big Pearl
ITEM_BIG_PEARL.description: A quite-large pearl that sparkles in a pretty silver color. It can be sold at a high price to shops.

ITEM_STARDUST.name: Stardust
ITEM_STARDUST.description: Lovely, red-colored sand with a loose, silky feel. It can be sold at a high price to shops.

ITEM_STAR_PIECE.name: Star Piece
ITEM_STAR_PIECE.description: A shard of a pretty gem that sparkles in a red color. It can be sold at a high price to shops.

ITEM_NUGGET.name: Nugget
ITEM_NUGGET.description: A nugget of pure gold that gives off a lustrous gleam. It can be sold at a high price to shops.

ITEM_HEART_SCALE.name: Heart Scale
ITEM_HEART_SCALE.description: A pretty, heart-shaped scale that is extremely rare. It glows faintly in the colors of the rainbow.

ITEM_HONEY.name: Honey
ITEM_HONEY.description: A sweet honey with a lush aroma that attracts wild Pokémon when it is used in grass, caves, or on special trees.

ITEM_GROWTH_MULCH.name: Growth Mulch
ITEM_GROWTH_MULCH.description: A fertilizer to be spread on soft soil. It speeds up the growth of Berries. However, it also dries the soil faster.

ITEM_DAMP_MULCH.name: Damp Mulch
ITEM_DAMP_MULCH.description: A fertilizer to be spread on soft soil. It slows the growth of Berries and causes the soil to dry slower.

ITEM_STABLE_MULCH.name: Stable Mulch
ITEM_STABLE_MULCH.description: A fertilizer to be spread on soft soil. It extends the time ripened Berries remain on their plants before falling.

ITEM_GOOEY_MULCH.name: Gooey Mulch
ITEM_GOOEY_MULCH.description: A fertilizer to be spread on soft soil. It ups the number of times new plants grow where mature plants withered.

ITEM_ROOT_FOSSIL.name: Root Fossil
ITEM_ROOT_FOSSIL.description: A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that lived in the sea. It appears to be part of a plant root.

ITEM_CLAW_FOSSIL.name: Claw Fossil
ITEM_CLAW_FOSSIL.description: A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that lived in the sea. It appears to be part of a claw.

ITEM_HELIX_FOSSIL.name: Helix Fossil
ITEM_HELIX_FOSSIL.description: A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that lived in the sea. It appears to be part of a seashell.

ITEM_DOME_FOSSIL.name: Dome Fossil
ITEM_DOME_FOSSIL.description: A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that lived in the sea. It appears to be part of a shell.

ITEM_OLD_AMBER.name: Old Amber
ITEM_OLD_AMBER.description: A piece of amber that contains the genetic material of an ancient Pokémon. It is clear with a reddish tint.

ITEM_ARMOR_FOSSIL.name: Armor Fossil
ITEM_ARMOR_FOSSIL.description: A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon that lived on the land. It appears to be part of a collar.

ITEM_SKULL_FOSSIL.name: Skull Fossil
ITEM_SKULL_FOSSIL.description: A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon that lived on the land. It appears to be part of a head.

ITEM_RARE_BONE.name: Rare Bone
ITEM_RARE_BONE.description: A bone that is extremely valuable for Pokémon archaeology. It can be sold for a high price to shops.

ITEM_SHINY_STONE.name: Shiny Stone
ITEM_SHINY_STONE.description: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It shines with a dazzling light.

ITEM_DUSK_STONE.name: Dusk Stone
ITEM_DUSK_STONE.description: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is as dark as dark can be.

ITEM_DAWN_STONE.name: Dawn Stone
ITEM_DAWN_STONE.description: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It sparkles like eyes.

ITEM_OVAL_STONE.name: Oval Stone
ITEM_OVAL_STONE.description: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is shaped like an egg.

ITEM_ODD_KEYSTONE.name: Odd Keystone
ITEM_ODD_KEYSTONE.description: A vital item that is needed to keep a stone tower from collapsing. Voices can be heard from it occasionally.

ITEM_GRISEOUS_ORB.name: Griseous Orb
ITEM_GRISEOUS_ORB.description: A glowing orb to be held by GIRATINA. It boosts the power of Dragon- and Ghost-type moves.

ITEM_ADAMANT_ORB.name: Adamant Orb
ITEM_ADAMANT_ORB.description: A brightly gleaming orb to be held by DIALGA. It boosts the power of Dragon- and Steel-type moves.

ITEM_LUSTROUS_ORB.name: Lustrous Orb
ITEM_LUSTROUS_ORB.description: A beautifully glowing orb to be held by PALKIA. It boosts the power of Dragon- and Water-type moves.

ITEM_GRASS_MAIL.name: Grass Mail
ITEM_GRASS_MAIL.description: Stationery featuring a print of a refreshingly green field. Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

ITEM_FLAME_MAIL.name: Flame Mail
ITEM_FLAME_MAIL.description: Stationery featuring a print of flames in blazing red. Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

ITEM_BUBBLE_MAIL.name: Bubble Mail
ITEM_BUBBLE_MAIL.description: Stationery featuring a print of a blue world underwater. Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

ITEM_BLOOM_MAIL.name: Bloom Mail
ITEM_BLOOM_MAIL.description: Stationery featuring a print of pretty floral patterns. Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

ITEM_TUNNEL_MAIL.name: Tunnel Mail
ITEM_TUNNEL_MAIL.description: Stationery featuring a print of a dimly lit coal mine. Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

ITEM_STEEL_MAIL.name: Steel Mail
ITEM_STEEL_MAIL.description: Stationery featuring a print of cool mechanical designs. Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

ITEM_HEART_MAIL.name: Heart Mail
ITEM_HEART_MAIL.description: Stationery featuring a print of giant heart patterns. Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

ITEM_SNOW_MAIL.name: Snow Mail
ITEM_SNOW_MAIL.description: Stationery featuring a print of a chilly, snow-covered world. Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

ITEM_SPACE_MAIL.name: Space Mail
ITEM_SPACE_MAIL.description: Stationery featuring a print depicting the huge expanse of space. Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

ITEM_AIR_MAIL.name: Air Mail
ITEM_AIR_MAIL.description: Stationery featuring a print of colorful letter sets. Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

ITEM_MOSAIC_MAIL.name: Mosaic Mail
ITEM_MOSAIC_MAIL.description: Stationery featuring a print of a vivid rainbow pattern. Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

ITEM_BRICK_MAIL.name: Brick Mail
ITEM_BRICK_MAIL.description: Stationery featuring a print of a tough-looking brick pattern. Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

ITEM_CHERI_BERRY.name: Cheri Berry
ITEM_CHERI_BERRY.description: It may be used or held by a Pokémon to recover from paralysis.

ITEM_CHESTO_BERRY.name: Chesto Berry
ITEM_CHESTO_BERRY.description: It may be used or held by a Pokémon to recover from sleep.

ITEM_PECHA_BERRY.name: Pecha Berry
ITEM_PECHA_BERRY.description: It may be used or held by a Pokémon to recover from poison.

ITEM_RAWST_BERRY.name: Rawst Berry
ITEM_RAWST_BERRY.description: It may be used or held by a Pokémon to recover from a burn.

ITEM_ASPEAR_BERRY.name: Aspear Berry
ITEM_ASPEAR_BERRY.description: It may be used or held by a Pokémon to defrost it.

ITEM_LEPPA_BERRY.name: Leppa Berry
ITEM_LEPPA_BERRY.description: It may be used or held by a Pokémon to restore a move’s PP by 10.

ITEM_ORAN_BERRY.name: Oran Berry
ITEM_ORAN_BERRY.description: It may be used or held by a Pokémon to heal the user by just 10 HP.

ITEM_PERSIM_BERRY.description: It may be used or held by a Pokémon to recover from confusion.

ITEM_LUM_BERRY.name: Lum Berry
ITEM_LUM_BERRY.description: It may be used or held by a Pokémon to recover from any status problem.

ITEM_SITRUS_BERRY.name: Sitrus Berry
ITEM_SITRUS_BERRY.description: It may be used or held by a Pokémon to heal the user’s HP a little.

ITEM_WIKI_BERRY.description: If held by a Pokémon, it restores the user’s HP in a pinch, but will cause confusion if it hates dry food.

ITEM_IAPAPA_BERRY.description: If held by a Pokémon, it restores the user’s HP in a pinch, but may cause confusion if it hates sour food.

ITEM_TM22.description: A two-turn attack. The user gathers light, then blasts a bundled beam on the second turn.

ITEM_TM23.name: TM23
ITEM_TM23.description: The foe is slammed with a sturdy tail of steel. It may also lower the target’s Defense stat if it hits.

ITEM_TM24.name: TM24
ITEM_TM24.description: A strong electric blast is loosed at the foe. It may also leave the foe paralyzed.

ITEM_TM25.name: TM25
ITEM_TM25.description: A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the foe to inflict damage. It may also leave the target paralyzed.

ITEM_TM26.name: TM26
ITEM_TM26.description: The user sets off an earthquake that hits all the Pokémon in the battle.

ITEM_TM27.name: TM27
ITEM_TM27.description: A full-power attack that grows more powerful the more the user likes its Trainer.

ITEM_TM28.name: TM28
ITEM_TM28.description: The user burrows, then attacks on the second turn. It can also be used to exit dungeons.

ITEM_TM29.name: TM29
ITEM_TM29.description: The foe is hit by a strong telekinetic force. It may also reduce the foe’s Sp. Def stat.

ITEM_TM30.name: TM30
ITEM_TM30.description: The user hurls a shadowy blob at the foe. It may also lower the foe’s Sp. Def stat.

ITEM_TM31.name: TM31
ITEM_TM31.description: The user attacks with tough fists, etc. It can also break any barrier such as Light Screen and Reflect.

ITEM_TM32.name: TM32
ITEM_TM32.description: The user begins moving so quickly that it creates illusory copies to raise its evasiveness.

ITEM_TM33.name: TM33
ITEM_TM33.description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to suppress damage from physical attacks for five turns.

ITEM_TM34.name: TM34
ITEM_TM34.description: The user strikes the foe with a quick jolt of electricity. This attack cannot be evaded.

ITEM_TM35.name: TM35
ITEM_TM35.description: The foe is scorched with an intense blast of fire. The target may also be left with a burn.

ITEM_TM36.name: TM36
ITEM_TM36.description: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the foe. It may also poison the target.

ITEM_TM37.name: TM37
ITEM_TM37.description: A five-turn sandstorm is summoned to hurt all combatants except the Rock, Ground, and Steel types.

ITEM_TM38.name: TM38
ITEM_TM38.description: The foe is attacked with an intense blast of all-consuming fire. It may also leave the target with a burn.

ITEM_TM39.name: TM39
ITEM_TM39.description: Large boulders are hurled at the foe to inflict damage. It lowers the foe’s Speed.

ITEM_TM40.name: TM40
ITEM_TM40.description: The user confounds the foe with speed, then strikes. The attack lands without fail.

ITEM_TM41.name: TM41
ITEM_TM41.description: The user torments and enrages the foe, making it incapable of using the same move twice in a row.

ITEM_TM42.name: TM42
ITEM_TM42.description: An attack move that doubles its power if the user is poisoned, paralyzed, or has a burn.

ITEM_TM43.name: TM43
ITEM_TM43.description: An attack move with effects that vary depending on the user’s environment.

ITEM_TM44.name: TM44
ITEM_TM44.description: The user goes to sleep for two turns. It fully restores the user’s HP and heals any status problem.

ITEM_TM45.name: TM45
ITEM_TM45.description: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the foe becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.

ITEM_TM46.name: TM46
ITEM_TM46.description: The user attacks and steals the foe’s held item simultaneously. It can’t steal if the user holds an item.

ITEM_TM47.name: TM47
ITEM_TM47.description: The foe is hit with wings of steel. It may also raise the user’s Defense stat.

ITEM_TM48.name: TM48
ITEM_TM48.description: The user employs its psychic power to exchange abilities with the foe.

ITEM_TM49.name: TM49
ITEM_TM49.description: The user steals the effects of any healing or status-changing move the foe attempts to use.

ITEM_TM50.name: TM50
ITEM_TM50.description: The user attacks the foe at full power using fiery energy. It also sharply reduces the user’s Sp. Atk.

ITEM_TM51.name: TM51
ITEM_TM51.description: The user lands and rests its body. It restores the user’s HP by up to half of its max HP.

ITEM_TM52.name: TM52
ITEM_TM52.description: The user attacks at full power. It may also lower the foe’s Sp. Def stat if it hits.

ITEM_TM53.name: TM53
ITEM_TM53.description: The user draws power from nature and fires it at the foe. It may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.

ITEM_TM54.name: TM54
ITEM_TM54.description: A restrained attack that prevents the foe from fainting. The target is left with at least 1 HP.

ITEM_TM55.name: TM55
ITEM_TM55.description: If the foe’s HP is down to under half, this attack will hit with double the power.

ITEM_TM56.name: TM56
ITEM_TM56.description: The user flings its held item at the foe to attack. Its power and effects depend on the item.

ITEM_TM57.name: TM57
ITEM_TM57.description: The user attacks with an electric charge. The user may use any remaining electricity to raise its Sp. Atk stat.

ITEM_TM58.name: TM58
ITEM_TM58.description: The user endures any attack, leaving 1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

ITEM_TM59.name: TM59
ITEM_TM59.description: The foe is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user’s gaping mouth.

ITEM_TM60.name: TM60
ITEM_TM60.description: An energy-draining punch. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

ITEM_TM61.name: TM61
ITEM_TM61.description: The user shoots a sinister, bluish white flame at the foe to inflict a burn.

ITEM_TM62.name: TM62
ITEM_TM62.description: The foe is attacked with powdery scales blown by wind. It may also raise all the user’s stats.

ITEM_TM63.name: TM63
ITEM_TM63.description: It prevents the foe from using its held item. Its Trainer is also prevented from using items on it.

ITEM_TM64.name: TM64
ITEM_TM64.description: The user explodes to inflict damage on all Pokémon in battle. The user faints upon using this move.

ITEM_TM65.name: TM65
ITEM_TM65.description: The user slashes with a sharp claw made from shadows. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

ITEM_TM66.name: TM66
ITEM_TM66.description: The user stores power, then attacks. If the user can use this attack after the foe, its power is doubled.

ITEM_TM67.name: TM67
ITEM_TM67.description: The user recycles a single-use item that has been used in battle so it can be used again.

ITEM_TM68.name: TM68
ITEM_TM68.description: The user charges the foe using every bit of its power. It must rest on the next turn to recover.

ITEM_TM69.name: TM69
ITEM_TM69.description: The user polishes its body to reduce drag. It sharply raises the Speed stat.

ITEM_TM70.name: TM70
ITEM_TM70.description: The user flashes a light that cuts the foe’s accuracy. It can also be used to illuminate caves.

ITEM_TM71.name: TM71
ITEM_TM71.description: The user stabs the foe with a sharpened stone from below. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

ITEM_TM72.name: TM72
ITEM_TM72.description: An attack move that inflicts double the damage if the user has been hurt by the foe in the same turn.

ITEM_TM73.name: TM73
ITEM_TM73.description: A weak electric charge is launched at the foe. It causes paralysis if it hits.

ITEM_TM74.name: TM74
ITEM_TM74.description: The user tackles the foe from a high-speed spin. The slower the user, the greater the damage.

ITEM_TM75.name: TM75
ITEM_TM75.description: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. It sharply raises the user’s Attack stat.

ITEM_TM76.name: TM76
ITEM_TM76.description: The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the foe. The trap hurts foes that switch into battle.

ITEM_TM77.name: TM77
ITEM_TM77.description: The user hypnotizes itself into copying any stat change made by the foe.

ITEM_TM78.name: TM78
ITEM_TM78.description: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the foe is charmed into sharply lowering its Sp. Atk stat.

ITEM_TM79.name: TM79
ITEM_TM79.description: The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark thoughts. It may also make the target flinch.

ITEM_TM80.name: TM80
ITEM_TM80.description: Large boulders are hurled at the foe to inflict damage. It may also make the target flinch.

ITEM_TM81.name: TM81
ITEM_TM81.description: The user slashes at the foe by crossing its scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors.

ITEM_TM82.name: TM82
ITEM_TM82.description: While it is asleep, the user randomly uses one of the moves it knows.

ITEM_TM83.name: TM83
ITEM_TM83.description: The user draws power from the Berry it is holding to attack. The Berry determines its type and power.

ITEM_TM84.name: TM84
ITEM_TM84.description: The foe is stabbed with a tentacle or arm steeped with poison. It may also poison the foe.

ITEM_TM85.name: TM85
ITEM_TM85.description: An attack that works only on a sleeping foe. It absorbs half the damage caused to heal the user’s HP.

ITEM_TM86.name: TM86
ITEM_TM86.description: The user snares the foe with grass and trips it. The heavier the foe, the greater the damage.

ITEM_TM87.name: TM87
ITEM_TM87.description: The user enrages the foe into confusion. However, it also sharply raises the foe’s Attack stat.

ITEM_TM88.name: TM88
ITEM_TM88.description: The user pecks the foe. If the foe is holding a Berry, the user plucks it and gains its effect.

ITEM_TM89.name: TM89
ITEM_TM89.description: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

ITEM_TM90.name: TM90
ITEM_TM90.description: The user makes a copy of itself using some of its HP. The copy serves as the user’s decoy.

ITEM_TM91.name: TM91
ITEM_TM91.description: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it in one shot. It may also lower the foe’s Sp. Def stat.

ITEM_TM92.name: TM92
ITEM_TM92.description: The user creates a bizarre space in which slower Pokémon get to move first for five turns.

ITEM_HM01.name: HM01
ITEM_HM01.description: The foe is cut with a scythe or a claw. It can also be used to cut down thin trees.

ITEM_HM02.name: HM02
ITEM_HM02.description: The user soars, then strikes on the second turn. It can also be used to fly to any familiar town.

ITEM_HM03.name: HM03
ITEM_HM03.description: It swamps the entire battlefield with a giant wave. It can also be used to cross water.

ITEM_HM04.name: HM04
ITEM_HM04.description: The foe is slugged with a punch thrown at maximum power. It can also be used to move boulders.

ITEM_HM05.name: HM05
ITEM_HM05.description: Traps foes in a violent swirling whirlpool. It can also be used to traverse whirlpools.

ITEM_HM06.name: HM06
ITEM_HM06.description: The user slugs the foe with a shattering punch. It can also smash cracked boulders.

ITEM_HM07.name: HM07
ITEM_HM07.description: The user charges the foe at an awesome speed. It can also be used to climb a waterfall.

ITEM_HM08.name: HM08
ITEM_HM08.description: A charging attack that may also leave the foe confused. It can also be used to scale rocky walls.

ITEM_LOOT_SACK.name: Loot Sack
ITEM_LOOT_SACK.description: A sturdy, spacious bag that is used to carry loot obtained in the coal mine.

ITEM_RULE_BOOK.name: Rule Book
ITEM_RULE_BOOK.description: It lists the rules for holding battles. For linked battles, you may choose which set of rules you wish to use.

ITEM_POKE_RADAR.name: Poké Radar
ITEM_POKE_RADAR.description: A tool that can search out Pokémon that are hiding in grass. Its battery is recharged as you walk.

ITEM_POINT_CARD.name: Point Card
ITEM_POINT_CARD.description: A card that lists the Battle Points you have earned.

ITEM_JOURNAL.name: Journal
ITEM_JOURNAL.description: A notebook that keeps a day-to-day record of your adventure so far.

ITEM_SEAL_CASE.name: Seal Case
ITEM_SEAL_CASE.description: A case for storing Seals that can be applied to the Capsule cases of Poké Balls.

ITEM_FASHION_CASE.name: Fashion Case
ITEM_FASHION_CASE.description: A fancy case for the tidy arrangement and storage of whimsical Pokémon Accessories.

ITEM_SEAL_BAG.name: Seal Bag
ITEM_SEAL_BAG.description: A tiny bag that can hold ten Seals for decorating Poké Balls.

ITEM_PAL_PAD.name: Pal Pad
ITEM_PAL_PAD.description: A convenient notepad that is used for registering your friends, Friend Codes, and keeping a record of game play.

ITEM_WORKS_KEY.name: Works Key
ITEM_WORKS_KEY.description: A large key for operating the doors of the Valley Windworks in the canyon. It was held by a Team Galactic Grunt.

ITEM_OLD_CHARM.name: Old Charm
ITEM_OLD_CHARM.description: An ancient good-luck charm made of Pokémon bones to be taken to the elder of Celestic Town.

ITEM_GALACTIC_KEY.name: Galactic Key
ITEM_GALACTIC_KEY.description: A card key for disengaging security systems in the Galactic HQ. Losing it can result in punishment, apparently.

ITEM_RED_CHAIN.name: Red Chain
ITEM_RED_CHAIN.description: A mythical chain that is said to link the legendary Pokémon that created the Sinnoh region.

ITEM_TOWN_MAP.name: Town Map
ITEM_TOWN_MAP.description: A very convenient map that can be viewed anytime. It even shows your present location.

ITEM_VS_SEEKER.name: Vs. Seeker
ITEM_VS_SEEKER.description: A device that indicates Trainers who want to battle. Its battery charges while you walk.

ITEM_COIN_CASE.name: Coin Case
ITEM_COIN_CASE.description: A case for holding coins obtained at the Game Corner. It holds up to 50,000 coins.

ITEM_OLD_ROD.name: Fishing Rod
ITEM_OLD_ROD.description: An old and beat-up fishing rod. Use it by any body of water to fish for wild aquatic Pokémon.

ITEM_GOOD_ROD.name: Good Rod
ITEM_GOOD_ROD.description: A new, good-quality fishing rod. Use it by any body of water to fish for wild aquatic Pokémon.

ITEM_SUPER_ROD.name: Super Rod
ITEM_SUPER_ROD.description: An awesome, high-tech fishing rod. Use it by any body of water to fish for wild aquatic Pokémon.

ITEM_SPRAYDUCK.name: Sprayduck
ITEM_SPRAYDUCK.description: A watering can shaped like a PSYDUCK. It helps promote healthy growth of Berries planted in soft soil.

ITEM_POFFIN_CASE.name: Poffin Case
ITEM_POFFIN_CASE.description: A case for storing Poffin cooked from Berries.

ITEM_BICYCLE.name: Bicycle
ITEM_BICYCLE.description: A folding Bicycle that enables much faster movement than the Running Shoes.

ITEM_SUITE_KEY.name: Suite Key
ITEM_SUITE_KEY.description: A key to one of the suites at the luxury hotel by a lake. For some odd reason, it often disappears.

ITEM_OAKS_LETTER.name: Clair’s Letter
ITEM_OAKS_LETTER.description: A letter from Prof. Oak. Written in it is a request for you to go to Rt. 224.

ITEM_LUNAR_WING.name: Lunar Wing
ITEM_LUNAR_WING.description: A feather that glows like the moon. It is said to possess the power to dispel nightmares.

ITEM_MEMBER_CARD.name: Member Card
ITEM_MEMBER_CARD.description: A card needed for entering the inn in Canalave City. Oddly, the last date marked on it was 50 years ago.

ITEM_AZURE_FLUTE.name: Azure Flute
ITEM_AZURE_FLUTE.description: A flute that puts out echoing sounds that do not seem to be of this world. It is unknown who made it.

ITEM_SS_TICKET.name: S.S. Ticket
ITEM_SS_TICKET.description: The ticket required for sailing on the ferry S.S. Aqua. It has a drawing of a ship on it.

ITEM_CONTEST_PASS.name: Contest Pass
ITEM_CONTEST_PASS.description: The pass required for entering Pokémon Contests. It has a drawing of an award ribbon on it.

ITEM_MAGMA_STONE.name: Magma Stone
ITEM_MAGMA_STONE.description: A stone formed when boulders melted in intensely hot magma, then hardened. Magma remains sealed inside.

ITEM_PARCEL.name: Parcel
ITEM_PARCEL.description: A parcel entrusted in your care. You are supposed to deliver it to your childhood friend who left Twinleaf Town.

ITEM_COUPON_1.name: Coupon 1
ITEM_COUPON_1.description: A coupon to be exchanged for a Pokémon Watch (Pokétch for short). Three coupons are needed.

ITEM_COUPON_2.name: Coupon 2
ITEM_COUPON_2.description: A coupon to be exchanged for a Pokémon Watch (Pokétch for short). Three coupons are needed.

ITEM_COUPON_3.name: Coupon 3
ITEM_COUPON_3.description: A coupon to be exchanged for a Pokémon Watch (Pokétch for short). Three coupons are needed.

ITEM_STORAGE_KEY.name: Storage Key
ITEM_STORAGE_KEY.description: The key to Team Galactic’s sinister warehouse located at the edge of Veilstone City.

ITEM_SECRET_MEDICINE.name: Secret Medicine
ITEM_SECRET_MEDICINE.description: A fantastic medicine dispensed by the pharmacy in Cianwood City. It fully heals a Pokémon of any ailment.

ITEM_VS_RECORDER.name: Vs. Recorder
ITEM_VS_RECORDER.description: An amazing device that can record a battle either between friends or at a special battle facility.

ITEM_GRACIDEA.name: Gracidea
ITEM_GRACIDEA.description: A flower sometimes bundled in bouquets to convey gratitude on special occasions like birthdays.

ITEM_SECRET_KEY.name: Secret Key
ITEM_SECRET_KEY.description: A high-tech key that has to be used at a specific location. It emits a special electric signal to open a door.

ITEM_APRICORN_BOX.name: Apricorn Box
ITEM_APRICORN_BOX.description: A handy box where you can store up to 99 Apricorns of each kind.

ITEM_UNOWN_REPORT.name: Unown Report
ITEM_UNOWN_REPORT.description: A report of all the discovered kinds of UNOWN.

ITEM_BERRY_POTS.name: Berry Pots
ITEM_BERRY_POTS.description: Handy containers for cultivating Berries wherever you go.

ITEM_DOWSING_MCHN.name: Dowsing Machine
ITEM_DOWSING_MCHN.description: It checks for unseen items in the area and makes noise and lights when it finds something.

ITEM_BLUE_CARD.name: Blue Card
ITEM_BLUE_CARD.description: A card to save points for the Buena’s Password show.

ITEM_SLOWPOKE_TAIL.name: Slowpoke Tail
ITEM_SLOWPOKE_TAIL.description: A very tasty tail of something. It sells for a high price.

ITEM_CLEAR_BELL.name: Clear Bell
ITEM_CLEAR_BELL.description: A very old-fashioned bell that makes a gentle ringing.

ITEM_CARD_KEY.name: Card Key
ITEM_CARD_KEY.description: A card key that opens a shutter in the Radio Tower.

ITEM_BASEMENT_KEY.name: Basement Key
ITEM_BASEMENT_KEY.description: A key that opens a door in the Goldenrod Tunnel.

ITEM_SQUIRT_BOTTLE.name: Squirt Bottle
ITEM_SQUIRT_BOTTLE.description: A bottle used for watering plants in the Berry Pots.

ITEM_RED_SCALE.name: Red Scale
ITEM_RED_SCALE.description: A scale from the red GYARADOS. It glows red like a flame.

ITEM_LOST_ITEM.name: Lost Item
ITEM_LOST_ITEM.description: The Poké Doll lost by the Copycat.

ITEM_PASS.name: Pass
ITEM_PASS.description: A ticket required for riding the Magnet Train. It allows you to ride whenever and however much you’d like.

ITEM_MACHINE_PART.name: Machine Part
ITEM_MACHINE_PART.description: An important machine part for the Power Plant that was stolen.

ITEM_SILVER_WING.name: Silver Wing
ITEM_SILVER_WING.description: A strange, silvery feather that sparkles.

ITEM_RAINBOW_WING.name: Rainbow Wing
ITEM_RAINBOW_WING.description: A mystical, rainbow feather that sparkles.

ITEM_MYSTERY_EGG.name: Mystery Egg
ITEM_MYSTERY_EGG.description: A mysterious Egg obtained from Mr. Pokémon. What’s in the Egg is unknown.

ITEM_RED_APRICORN.name: Red Apricorn
ITEM_RED_APRICORN.description: A red Apricorn. It assails your nostrils.

ITEM_YELLOW_APRICORN.name: Yellow Apricorn
ITEM_YELLOW_APRICORN.description: A yellow Apricorn. It has an invigorating scent.

ITEM_BLUE_APRICORN.name: Blue Apricorn
ITEM_BLUE_APRICORN.description: A blue Apricorn. It smells a bit like grass.

ITEM_GREEN_APRICORN.name: Green Apricorn
ITEM_GREEN_APRICORN.description: A green Apricorn. It has a mysterious, aromatic scent.

ITEM_PINK_APRICORN.name: Pink Apricorn
ITEM_PINK_APRICORN.description: A pink Apricorn. It has a nice, sweet scent.

ITEM_WHITE_APRICORN.name: White Apricorn
ITEM_WHITE_APRICORN.description: A white Apricorn. It doesn’t smell like anything.

ITEM_BLACK_APRICORN.name: Black Apricorn
ITEM_BLACK_APRICORN.description: A black Apricorn It has an indescribable scent.

ITEM_FAST_BALL.name: Fast Ball
ITEM_FAST_BALL.description: A Poké Ball that makes it easier to catch fast Pokémon.

ITEM_LEVEL_BALL.name: Level Ball
ITEM_LEVEL_BALL.description: A Poké Ball for catching Pokémon that are a lower level than your own.

ITEM_LURE_BALL.name: Lure Ball
ITEM_LURE_BALL.description: A Poké Ball for catching Pokémon hooked by a Rod when fishing.

ITEM_HEAVY_BALL.name: Heavy Ball
ITEM_HEAVY_BALL.description: A Poké Ball for catching very heavy Pokémon.

ITEM_LOVE_BALL.name: Love Ball
ITEM_LOVE_BALL.description: Poké Ball for catching Pokémon that are the opposite gender of your Pokémon.

ITEM_FRIEND_BALL.name: Friend Ball
ITEM_FRIEND_BALL.description: A Poké Ball that makes caught Pokémon more friendly.

ITEM_MOON_BALL.name: Moon Ball
ITEM_MOON_BALL.description: A Poké Ball for catching Pokémon that evolve using the Moon Stone.

ITEM_SPORT_BALL.name: Sport Ball
ITEM_SPORT_BALL.description: A special Poké Ball for the Bug-Catching Contest.

ITEM_PARK_BALL.name: Park Ball
ITEM_PARK_BALL.description: A special Poké Ball for the Pal Park.

ITEM_PHOTO_ALBUM.name: Photo Album
ITEM_PHOTO_ALBUM.description: A nice photo album for storing all the photos taken along your adventure.

ITEM_GB_SOUNDS.name: GB Sounds
ITEM_GB_SOUNDS.description: A music player that allows you to listen to nostalgic songs. It’s operated with a single switch.

ITEM_TIDAL_BELL.name: Tidal Bell
ITEM_TIDAL_BELL.description: An old-fashioned bell with a gentle, soothing sound.

ITEM_RAGE_CANDY_BAR.name: Rage Candy Bar
ITEM_RAGE_CANDY_BAR.description: A famous candy in Mahogany Town. Many tourists like to buy them to take home.

ITEM_DATA_CARD_01.name: Data Card 01
ITEM_DATA_CARD_01.description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a card that shows how many victories you’ve had.

ITEM_DATA_CARD_02.name: Data Card 02
ITEM_DATA_CARD_02.description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a card that shows how many losses you’ve had.

ITEM_DATA_CARD_03.name: Data Card 03
ITEM_DATA_CARD_03.description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a card that shows how many times your Pokémon have dashed.

ITEM_DATA_CARD_04.name: Data Card 04
ITEM_DATA_CARD_04.description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a card that shows how many times your Pokémon have jumped.

ITEM_DATA_CARD_05.name: Data Card 05
ITEM_DATA_CARD_05.description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a card that shows how many times you’ve won the Hurdle Dash.

ITEM_DATA_CARD_06.name: Data Card 06
ITEM_DATA_CARD_06.description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a card that shows how many times you’ve won the Relay Run.

ITEM_DATA_CARD_07.name: Data Card 07
ITEM_DATA_CARD_07.description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a card that shows how many times you’ve won Pennant Capture.

ITEM_DATA_CARD_08.name: Data Card 08
ITEM_DATA_CARD_08.description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a card that shows how many times you’ve won Block Smash.

ITEM_DATA_CARD_09.name: Data Card 09
ITEM_DATA_CARD_09.description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a card that shows how many times you’ve won Disc Catch.

ITEM_DATA_CARD_10.name: Data Card 10
ITEM_DATA_CARD_10.description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a card that shows how many times you’ve won Snow Throw.

ITEM_DATA_CARD_11.name: Data Card 11
ITEM_DATA_CARD_11.description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a card that shows how many points your Pokémon scored.

ITEM_DATA_CARD_12.name: Data Card 12
ITEM_DATA_CARD_12.description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a card that shows how many times your Pokémon have failed.

ITEM_DATA_CARD_13.name: Data Card 13
ITEM_DATA_CARD_13.description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a card that shows how many times your Pokémon impeded themselves.

ITEM_DATA_CARD_14.name: Data Card 14
ITEM_DATA_CARD_14.description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a card that shows how many times your Pokémon have tackled.

ITEM_DATA_CARD_15.name: Data Card 15
ITEM_DATA_CARD_15.description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a card that shows how many times your Pokémon have fallen down.

ITEM_DATA_CARD_16.name: Data Card 16
ITEM_DATA_CARD_16.description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a card that shows how many times you’ve won Ring Drop.

ITEM_DATA_CARD_17.name: Data Card 17
ITEM_DATA_CARD_17.description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a card that shows how many times you’ve won Lamp Jump.

ITEM_DATA_CARD_18.name: Data Card 18
ITEM_DATA_CARD_18.description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a card that shows how many times you’ve won Circle Push.

ITEM_DATA_CARD_19.name: Data Card 19
ITEM_DATA_CARD_19.description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a card that shows how many  Link Pokéathlon wins you’ve had.

ITEM_DATA_CARD_20.name: Data Card 20
ITEM_DATA_CARD_20.description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a card that shows how many Link Pokéathlon losses you’ve had.

ITEM_DATA_CARD_21.name: Data Card 21
ITEM_DATA_CARD_21.description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a card that shows how many times you’ve won an event.

ITEM_DATA_CARD_22.name: Data Card 22
ITEM_DATA_CARD_22.description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a card that shows how many times  you’ve lost an event.

ITEM_DATA_CARD_23.name: Data Card 23
ITEM_DATA_CARD_23.description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a card that shows how many times you’ve switched Pokémon.

ITEM_DATA_CARD_24.name: Data Card 24
ITEM_DATA_CARD_24.description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a card that shows how many times you’ve won Goal Roll.

ITEM_DATA_CARD_25.name: Data Card 25
ITEM_DATA_CARD_25.description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a card that shows how many times your Pokémon won individual prizes.

ITEM_DATA_CARD_26.name: Data Card 26
ITEM_DATA_CARD_26.description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a card that shows how many times you’ve instructed your Pokémon.

ITEM_DATA_CARD_27.name: Data Card 27
ITEM_DATA_CARD_27.description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a card that shows how much time you’ve spent in the Pokéathlon.

ITEM_JADE_ORB.name: Jade Orb

ITEM_PIXIE_PLATE.name: Pixie Plate
ITEM_PIXIE_PLATE.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Fairy-type moves.

ITEM_ABSORB_BULB.name: Absorb Bulb
ITEM_ABSORB_BULB.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This single-use bulb boosts Sp. Atk if hit with a Water-type attack.

ITEM_AIR_BALLOON.name: Air Balloon
ITEM_AIR_BALLOON.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder will float in the air until hit. Once hit, this item will burst.

ITEM_BALM_MUSHROOM.name: Balm Mushroom
ITEM_BALM_MUSHROOM.description: A rare mushroom that gives off a nice fragrance. It can be sold at a high price to shops.

ITEM_BIG_NUGGET.name: Big Nugget
ITEM_BIG_NUGGET.description: A big nugget of pure gold that gives off a lustrous gleam. It can be sold at a high price to shops.

ITEM_EVIOLITE.name: Eviolite
ITEM_EVIOLITE.description: A mysterious evolutionary lump. When held by a Pokémon that can still evolve, it boosts Defense and Sp. Def by 50%.

ITEM_PRISM_SCALE.name: Prism Scale
ITEM_PRISM_SCALE.description: A mysterious scale that causes a certain Pokémon to evolve. It shines in rainbow colors.

ITEM_ROCKY_HELMET.name: Rocky Helmet
ITEM_ROCKY_HELMET.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. If the holder is hit with a contact move, the attacker is damaged by a sixth of its HP.

ITEM_ABILITY_CAPSULE.name: Ability Capsule
ITEM_ABILITY_CAPSULE.description: A capsule that allows a Pokémon to switch its current Ability to the other Ability its species can have.

ITEM_ASSAULT_VEST.name: Assault Vest
ITEM_ASSAULT_VEST.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This vest boosts the holder’s Sp. Def by 50%, but makes its status moves fail.

ITEM_SACHET.name: Sachet
ITEM_SACHET.description: A sachet filled with fragrant perfumes that are just slightly too overwhelming. It’s loved by a certain Pokémon.

ITEM_WEAKNESS_POLICY.name: Weakness Policy
ITEM_WEAKNESS_POLICY.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This item sharply raises its Attack and Sp. Atk if hit by a supereffective move.

ITEM_WHIPPED_DREAM.name: Whipped Dream
ITEM_WHIPPED_DREAM.description: A soft and sweet treat made of fluffy, puffy, whipped, and whirled cream. It’s loved by a certain Pokémon.

ITEM_BOTTLE_CAP.name: Bottle Cap
ITEM_BOTTLE_CAP.description: A lovely silver bottle cap. Certain people are delighted to be given one of these.

ITEM_ICE_STONE.name: Ice Stone
ITEM_ICE_STONE.description: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It has a snowflake pattern in it.

ITEM_ABILITY_PATCH.name: Ability Patch
ITEM_ABILITY_PATCH.description: A patch that can be used to change the regular Ability of a Pokémon to a rarer Ability, or the opposite.

ITEM_BLACK_AUGURITE.name: Black Augurite
ITEM_BLACK_AUGURITE.description: A glassy black stone that produces a sharp cutting edge when split. It is loved by a certain Pokémon.

ITEM_GALARICA_CUFF.name: Galarica Cuff
ITEM_GALARICA_CUFF.description: A cuff made from Galarica Twigs that were woven together. It makes a certain Pokémon very happy.

ITEM_GALARICA_WREATH.name: Galarica Wreath
ITEM_GALARICA_WREATH.description: A wreath made from Galarica Twigs that were woven together. It makes a certain Pokémon very happy.

ITEM_HEAVY_DUTY_BOOTS.name: HeavyDutyBoots
ITEM_HEAVY_DUTY_BOOTS.description: Also known as the Heavy-Duty Boots. These boots protect the holder from traps set on the battlefield.

ITEM_LINKING_CORD.name: Linking Cord
ITEM_LINKING_CORD.description: A string exuding an odd energy that makes you feel a sense of connection. It’s loved by certain Pokémon.

ITEM_PEAT_BLOCK.name: Peat Block
ITEM_PEAT_BLOCK.description: A block of muddy material that can be used as fuel for burning when dried. It is loved by a certain Pokémon.

ITEM_THROAT_SPRAY.name: Throat Spray
ITEM_THROAT_SPRAY.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. If the holder uses a sound-based move, this item will boost its Sp. Atk stat.

ITEM_COVERT_CLOAK.name: Covert Cloak
ITEM_COVERT_CLOAK.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This hooded cloak protects the holder from the additional effects of moves.

ITEM_LEADERS_CREST.name: Leader’s Crest
ITEM_LEADERS_CREST.description: A shard of what appears to be an old blade of some sort. It is loved by a certain Pokémon.

ITEM_LOADED_DICE.name: Loaded Dice
ITEM_LOADED_DICE.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This loaded dice ensures the holder’s multistrike moves hit at least 4 times.

ITEM_ROSELI_BERRY.name: Roseli Berry
ITEM_ROSELI_BERRY.description: If held, it halves the damage taken from a supereffective Fairy-type attack. (This Berry cannot be planted.)

ITEM_COVER_FOSSIL.name: Cover Fossil
ITEM_COVER_FOSSIL.description: A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that lived in the sea. It appears to be part of its back.

ITEM_PLUME_FOSSIL.name: Plume Fossil
ITEM_PLUME_FOSSIL.description: A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that lived in the sky. It appears to be part of its wing.

ITEM_JAW_FOSSIL.name: Jaw Fossil
ITEM_JAW_FOSSIL.description: A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that lived on the land. It appears to be part of a large jaw.

ITEM_SAIL_FOSSIL.name: Sail Fossil
ITEM_SAIL_FOSSIL.description: A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that lived in the land. It appears to be an impression of a skin sail.
